products.description:
Apple TV is a set-top streaming device that connects to your television via HDMI and turns it into a smart TV.

Key features

tvOS operating system with a smooth, ad-free interface

Supports 4K HDR, Dolby Vision, Dolby Atmos (on Apple TV 4K)

Siri Remote for voice search and control

Access to apps like Netflix, YouTube, Disney+, Prime Video, Spotify, etc.

Seamless integration with the Apple ecosystem (iPhone, iPad, Mac, AirPods, HomePod)

Can act as a HomeKit hub for smart-home automation

Supports Apple Arcade games

ðŸ‘‰ Think of it as a powerful, premium alternative to Android TV boxes or Fire TV.

Samsung TV refers to the range of smart televisions manufactured by Samsung, one of the worldâ€™s largest consumer-electronics brands. Samsung TVs are known for display innovation, smart features, and strong hardware quality.
iPhone is a premium smartphone line designed and developed by Apple. It is known for its smooth performance, long software support, strong security, and deep ecosystem integration.
Rolex watches are luxury Swiss mechanical timepieces manufactured by Rolex. Rolex is globally known for precision, durability, craftsmanship, and status value rather than flashy trends.
